channel.title: Server source?
channel.description:
In Mod Taharok's guide for creating a server, he says:
Ok now go into your server source (if you dont have a rar uncmopresser you can download 7zip at this link: 7zip, or you can download rar uncompresser at this link: WinRar. Ok now you can right click the compressed source and click "extract here"), and now when in your server srouce, right click compile.bat and click "edit".
I have downloaded both 7zip and WinRar. I still can't find my server source. Any help will be great. Thanks.

item.title: Server source?
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“pur3 pik3r 9, post:3, topic:92409”]P.S- You don’t have to download both 7zip and WinRar.[/quote] WinRar is better imo

item.title: Server source?

item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

open WinRar and hit ctrl f. search for the name of the sorce and it should come up.

In Mod Taharok’s guide for creating a server, he says:
